item.title: Late Dinner
item.description: Crackly-Toasted Late Dinner Rice ðŸ˜± Rice 2 cups short grain white rice Water, to cover rice to a depth of 1” (or consult your rice cooker instructions) Toppings 2 tbsp butter 1 tbsp good soy sauce (san j, ohsawa) 2 cloves garlic, smashed & chopped 2 thinly sliced scallions Method Put the rice and water in a pan, cover and bring to a boil.
